name: XGJ21 - Arcave
description:
South-Eastern Finland University of Applied Sciences hosted a game jam for it's students. The theme was arcade and this is what our team came up with. 

Retrogamer has a gaming cave filled with retro games in their basement and you can test their cool fighting or shooting arcade machines! 

Game made by Miia Jeskanen, Jarno Kankainen, Essi Kykkänen, Ida Rask, Mikael Törni.
